items.name: Crossbow-nothing-special
items.description: One tick to load the crossbow. One to fire.
items.note: Beware about the safety of your ol' Betsy.

items.name: Sword in the stone
items.description: The sword is still stuck in the stone... So basically, you hit your enemies with the stone.
items.note: A sword! Archimedes, a sword!

items.name: Evergreen staff
items.description: Consume 1 use of Evergreen staff as an instantaneous action to increase the damage dealt by a damaging spell cast within 2 hexes.
items.note: You would not part an old man from his walking stick?

items.name: Poisonous blowgun
items.description: The target suffers 2 additional poison damage.
items.note: That’s gotta sting.

items.name: YOU-are-coming Spear
items.description: Any time you throw this spear you are teleported in a random free adjacent tile to the one in which the spear landed, at the end of the tick. If there are no available tiles, you remain in your position and take 1 magic damage.
items.note: You can feel some sort of attachment.

items.name: Bow and sparrow
items.description: After you hit a target Jack the sparrow pecks anyone in a 2 hexes radius area around the target, dealing 1 damage each. Occupy 1 slot in the backpack.
items.note: You are without doubt the worst ranged weapon I’ve ever heard of.

items.name: Tuba
items.description: Makes a deafening sound that deals 2 sound damage in a 3 hexes radius area. Alternatively, you can consume 1 use to follow a target adjacent to you for the duration of 3 ticks, dealing 2 sound damage to him each tick. Tuba counts as an instrument for a Bard. Occupy 1 slot in the backpack.
items.note: Pom pom pom po pom.

items.name: Black Mambaaaaa
items.description: You can take a 1 tick action to argue with an enemy about being a villain. There is a 50% chance they reply and lose their actions in the current tick.
items.note: The best presentation!

items.name: Plot armor
items.description: If you would take damage that reduces you to 0 HP, dodge that attack or effect and discard Plot armor.
items.note: Oh my, 20 dollars!

items.name: Ring mail leggings-nothing-special
items.note: Absolutely noteworthy.

items.name: Cousin Itt’s fluff
items.description: You are immune to ranged attacks, but you suffer twice the fire damage. Lose 5% AG.
items.note: Can you hear me down there?

items.name: Viking helmet
items.description: You can consume a hit of Viking helmet to perform a 1 tick action to head an adjacent target dealing 2 damage with a 20% chance they stay stunned the next tick.
items.note: Evening brother!

items.name: Beekeeper's vest
items.description: You are immune to Poisonous blowgun. You lose 5% AG and gain the ability Not the bees, not the bees! : With a 1 tick action you can pull out your personal beehive. Then, a swarm of loyal bees buzz around you dealing 1 poison damage to anyone that would enter in contact with you. With another 1 tick action you can put away the beehive and call back the bees.
items.note: Bee our vest, bee our vest, bee our vest!

items.name: Iron chestplate-nothing-special
items.description: Any time you are dealt fire damage, you suffer 1 additional damage. Lose 10% AG.
items.note: No iron golem was hurt to make this.

items.name: Encouraging compliments
items.description: Target ally increases the damage they deal in the next tick by 2. Also, their LK grows by 1 for their next looting (no more than 1 LK can be given with this spell before the next looting).
items.note: You are not quite a complete failure!

items.name: It was him!
items.description: Target minion is convinced they have been hit by another minion, becoming hostile to him next tick. There is a 10% chance a feud begins and they will remain permanently hostile to each other.
items.note: It’s treason, then.

items.name: Left alone
items.description: Target minion stinks so badly in this tick so that anyone in a 2 hexes radius area loses their action and spends this tick walking away in disgust. The smelly one also loses their action crying with shame.
items.note: Why doesn’t anyone love me?

items.name: Spicy meatball!
items.description: Lob a giant spicy meatball to a target. Target takes 2 additional fire damage.
items.note: Mamma mia! That’s a spicy meatball.

items.name: Harden
items.description: An armor piece of your choice gains 3 additional resistance and an extra hit.
items.note: Go Tankapod, use Harden!

items.name: Scale along Z
items.description: A melee weapon of your choice gains 2 range and 2 damage for the duration of 4 ticks.
items.note: Behold my scaling matrices!

items.name: Quicksilver
items.description: You gain ludicrous speed: in the next tick you can perform up to 5 ticks of movement actions (non damaging abilities are also fine) and gain 45% AG.
items.note: My brains… are going into my feet!

items.name: Dandelion
items.description: Eat it to heal 2 HP. Consuming Dandelion while looting increases your LK by 2.
items.note: Must be the last one of the season!

items.name: Gargaleo’s flute
items.description: Summon a rainy cloud in a target hex. Anyone in the cloud cannot see anything or ignite any flame. Furthermore, they lose their AG. A dehydrated unit can be rehydrated with this effect. This item counts as an instrument for a Bard. Occupy 1 slot in the backpack.
items.note: Once belonged to the famous enchanter flutist Gargaleo.

items.name: Forget-me-spray
items.description: Target minion falls asleep the next tick for a duration of 5 ticks. If the target is a hostile minion, they turn neutral as they wake up, but you have to convince them that you’re not hostile otherwise they’ll turn back to hostile.
items.note: Yeah, I'm like your space Dad!

items.name: Fire extinguisher
items.description: Negate a fire effect or extinguish a burning flame.
items.note: Seymour! The house is on fire!

items.name: Extract of llama
items.description: Turn into a llama for 5 ticks. You keep your armour but your only attack is replaced by Magical Spitball at no mana cost
items.note: A llama? He’s supposed to be dead!

items.name: Strong black potion
items.description: Multiple item loot. You get 1 additional damage in your melee attacks for 5 ticks.
items.note: Can you feel its dark power?

items.name: Werehorn
items.description: This item makes you emulate a wolf’s call: for any minion in a 5 hexes radius area, there is a 25% chance they lose their action in this tick. Werehorn counts as an instrument for a Bard.
items.note: There horn. There castle.
